page.title: 09A RECTORS DAY CONT
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF THE RECTOR OF { COATES - JULY 1985. } 6.00pm SUPPER 7.00pm EVENING ENGAGEMENTS ENDING SOMETIME BEFORE 10.30pm. ON MONDAY I TRY TO SPEND THE WHOLE DAY AT MY DESK TO PREPARE FOR THE REST OF THE WEEK.(IT DOESN'T OFTEN HAPPEN.) ON TUESDAY MORNING,DURING TERM TIME, I TEACH AT THE THREE SCHOOLS OF COATES, SAPPERTON AND RODMARTON.ON WEDNESDAY THERE IS USUALLY A MEETING AT GLOUCESTER THAT I HAVE TO ATTEND. ON THURSDAY,IN TERM TIME,THERE IS USUALLY A LUNCH TIME SERVICE AT THE COLLEGE. FRIDAY LUNCHTIME TO SATURDAY LUNCHTIME IS MY DAY OFF. SATURDAY EVENING IS SPENT TIDYING UP ENDS FOR SUNDAY. THE SUNDAY SERVICES ARE 8am TARLTON ONCE A MONTH,9.15 COATES,10.30 SAPPERTON AND RODMARTON.THERE IS A SERVICE AT 3pm or 6pm ON THREE SUNDAYS OF THE MONTH.
